documents.document: I LOVE #Wijnaldum ! Goes under the radar so much.
Hazard throws himself to the floor so much! Little BITCH!!
BIG summer ahead for us. A lot of movement to happen, both in's and outs! #LFC🔴
Gutted that @mamadousakho has left! Top class CB IMO #LFC🔴
If only #Firmino was prolific in front of goal! #LFC🔴
@Ellis_86 We're in a major rut right now but those asking for Klopp to be sacked need to give their heads a wobble!
@riacook_vc Can't see it happening 😡
@Ellis_86 Well we're still in the top 4. But every team will play shit negative tactics against us now. We need a plan B.
@Ellis_86 He does take too many touches I agree. When he was going forward last season, he looked dangerous. Not doing it as much this year.
@Ellis_86 He's not awful, he's just not in any sort of form at all. Plus, I wouldn't play him and Hendo together. They're too similar.
We've been sussed. Negative football, park the bus and catch us on the counter. January has been a shit month! #LFC🔴
@AntValo Should've*
@AntValo Can and Hendo can't play together too. Unless it's to hold midfield in tight games to hold on to a lead. Gini shouldn't started
@AntValo Can't see it happening though 😔 too may teams parking the bus against us now and we just can't break them down.
What a great weekend it is for Chelsea!
We will not get in the top four this season! Wheels have well and truly come off. 2 Klopp signings on the pitch. He needs to spend! #LFC
@riacook_vc Yeh we miss Mané massively. Hendo been a big miss recently too. He's such an important player for us I don't think many realise
@riacook_vc And Mignolet! But yeh Lovren was class. Only City away against the 'Big 6' now and the rest at Anfield. Players to come back too
Fucking hell! 😂😂😂😂 class! https://t.co/ysY2xYLY5n
@riacook_vc And apart from a terrible linesman who for some reason was ahead of the play...and we had injuries against a full strength Utd!
@Musker_LFC Hopefully we can take our 'big game' form against the so called lesser teams this half of the season and finish strong! #LFC🔴
Fuck knows why he's so far ahead of play the idiot. https://t.co/ecM4SL4VYT
No offside from there!? Really?? Terrible officials yet again!
And there it is... scummy cunts! https://t.co/gKWA0oYAlL
Michael Oliver... joke of a ref!
Dirty cunt!! https://t.co/E0Ps5hiqy9
#Gerrard song being sung again 😂😂 another team obsessed!
@riacook_vc Fingers crossed we can both be smiling tomorrow! 😁✌🏻
@riacook_vc Massive game tomorrow now with how the results have gone today! Nervous is an understatement! 😳🙈
@riacook_vc Yeh they are the worst! Top of the league, 7 points clear and they're singing about him. Prob cos he rejected a terrible club😂
@riacook_vc Teams are still obsessed with him. It hasn't just been Chelsea this season either...
Mad how these clubs are still obsessed with #Gerrard 😂. Every week, rival clubs chant his name! #LFC🔴
Spurs looking good. Poch doing a great job there!
@riacook_vc Definitely should be winning but that's football I suppose. Still, some big games to come. United in the league next 🙌🏻
@riacook_vc I get like that too. Still 2nd in the PL and a semi final on the way so don't feel bad for too long 😁😁
@riacook_vc Suppose it gives the kids another chance but at Anfield we should be beating them. They camped in their own half all game! 🙈
#Plymouth bring more fans to Anfield than #Hull had in their entire stadium the other day in their @EmiratesFACup game! Class! #LFC🔴
Hahaha why would he want to leave #LFC for #Spurs 😂😂 https://t.co/LYUYcH3Hsr
@DaveOCKOP Hopefully a Chinese club pay £100M for him 😆
WTF! Chinese football is becoming ridiculous! 😳 https://t.co/5ESw87NIfv
Hopefully this gets brought over here at some point. The more help the refs get, the better! https://t.co/RKI7l1h5Cb
Hopefully we can strengthen this window and stay hot on the heels at the top. With Mané gone and injuries, we need quality cover! #LFC 🔴
West Ham desperate for a striker then...
What the absolute EFF!?! https://t.co/0stSE548iw
@C_Hannan7 @RS51DHU 100%! Then, as long as we don't slip up, anything can happen. £6.4M net spend and look where we are.In good hands #Klopp
@C_Hannan7 @RS51DHU Still 54 points to play for. FIFTY FOUR! Give your heads a wobble. We'd have all taken top 4 start of the season anyway
@LFCforlife17 @YaroLFC What coach? Not Klopp surely! If you mean Klopp then you need a long look in the mirror my friend 😂
Hahahaha officials need some scrutinising time after time. Not just from this either but loads of decisions recentl… https://t.co/BjJ1YKiDvC
Refereeing these days is a joke! Some shambolic decisions being made week in week out
Beating City and then drawing to relegation fodder! Same old #LFC🔴. Some big games coming up and Mane leaving. Big performances needed!
79% 2nd half possession! Should be winning this! #LFC🔴
2 fucking penalties!? Fuck off!!!
#Sturridge 😩 made of bloody glass that man!
Takes #Mane out of my @OfficialFPL team thinking his head wouldn't be in it with #AFCON2017 coming up... and he scores! 😤 #LFC🔴
#LFC to win today and a draw between #THFC and #CFC Wednesday would be a great birthday present! 🙌🏻🔴
@OfficialFPL Ok, thanks.
@OfficialFPL Can I not play my bench boost the same week as using a wildcard?
@OfficialFPL Never mind, I've sorted it. Thanks a lot. Saved me costing myself 28 points 🙈
@OfficialFPL It's saying wildcard is unavailable?
@OfficialFPL Just made transfers accidentally forgetting to click to use my wildcard 😔 can it be changed to use my wildcard? 😩😩
What a goal!! 😱😱#Giroud
Roll on #JanuaryTransferWindow 🙌🏻
That's a fantastic header that! #Wijnaldum #LFC🔴
Absolutely! Unsung hero for us so far. Keeps us ticking and going forward 🙌🏻 #LFC🔴 https://t.co/9rdFUHchix
@JamesMurphyTips Over 2.5 in the Rangers match?
@JamesMurphyTips Booom! Had £237 on it and was getting slightly nervous...😅
Get in! Great result considering the pressures of yesterday's results!! #LFC🔴
#Firmino hunting Shawcross causes that. He's trying a back pass from 30+ yards! Up the REDS!! #LFC🔴
@RhysDibble Literally just tweeted saying Sturridge will get a goal here 😂
#Sturridge to get a goal here. Hopefully not an injury too... #LFC🔴
What!? 😂😂😂😂 https://t.co/pnJZd4uTdL
@GuillemBalague If you could suck him off, you would! Probably wouldn't use any hands either!!
BIG day for #LFC now tomorrow! #LIVSTO 🔴
What an idiot! https://t.co/dYWYyQZwLz
@KevinQuinnTips Hopefully a better start to this than yesterday's attempt...
#Lallana has improved immensely under #Klopp! Probably first name on the team sheet these days #LFC🔴🙌🏻
Brilliant football #LFC🔴... #ORIGI❤️
All this pressure HAS to pay off! Come on #LFC🔴
West Ham lead through gifts. We won't get anywhere this season conceding goals like that! Sort it out!!! #LFC🔴
@luke8grey @Ellis_86 @JordanWebber96 @LeeTrundle10 Filthy! 👏🏻
Love the way #Klopp talks after games. Immediately picks me up #LFC🔴
If only we had a world class 'keeper and a defence to cope without Matip! #LFC🔴
So Origi can't score a tap in from 3 yards but does that..! #Origi❤️ #LFC🔴
No #Matip in the team today could be crucial. Major blow #LFC🔴
Remember the name... Ben #Woodburn #LFC🔴🙌🏻
@EASPORTSFIFA Sort out your fucking shit connection servers please! You bunch of shit cunts!!
WOW! #Rostov beating #Bayern is a hell of a result! The Russian Leicester...
@TheOddsBible Fuck! Was hoping this was Olof Mellberg's year...
Better to not lose but felt like 2 points dropped for sure! #Southampton a tough place to go and defended for their… https://t.co/U7GWRwoOFl
@luke8grey @TheNotoriousMMA Watched highlights this morning. That left hook was monstrous! Easy 💷💷
@luke8grey @TheNotoriousMMA Put my football winnings on him to win outright. Never in doubt! #ConorMcGregor #UFC205 🙌🏻
@Ellis_86 @anthonyrobins8 Maybe, but right now, I think Barcelona are going to have to break world record to sign him. LFC won't sell
@Ellis_86 @anthonyrobins8 I'd rather Coutinho than Pogba all day everyday. Influences games a hell of a lot more!
@anthonyrobins8 100% worth more!
@NathanOzzie @JiveArsenal @Squawka I know. My Sunday team would prob score 8 past them too. Just saying he's done well since leaving Arsenal
#Germany winning 8-0!? EIGHT!!!!! Still time for at least 2 more too 😂🙈
Yet he was average at best for Arsenal 🤔 https://t.co/dZank2M0Op
Fuck off #Barcelona ! Would have to be a world record bid to sign him anyway ... #Coutinho 🔴
Finally!!!! @GWijnaldum 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻 #LFC🔴
Still can't keep a clean sheet 😤😴 #LFC 🔴
